transport.question: I have wheels and carry people, but I'm not a car. I often travel on rails. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I make a 'choo choo' sound
🛤️ I travel on a track
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Many people can ride me at once

transport.question: I float on water and can be big or small. I carry people or things across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move
⚓ I often have a captain
🚢 I am bigger than a raft

transport.question: I have two wheels and pedals, and you use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚲 I need a helmet for safety
🚦 You can ride me in a park
👣 You use your legs to move me

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and take people to far away places very quickly. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I fly above the clouds
✈️ I need a runway to take off
🌍 I can take you to another country

transport.question: I am long and carry many people through a city. I stop at designated spots for people to get on and off. What am I?

hints.text: 🏢 I travel on roads in cities
🛑 I stop frequently
🎟️ You usually need a ticket to ride me

transport.question: I’m a vehicle that works under the ground. I can take many people to many destinations in the city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I travel in tunnels
⚡ I often use electricity
🗺️ You can use me to navigate a city

transport.question: I have a motor and three wheels. I am often used to carry cargo or passengers in some countries. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇳 I am popular in India and Southeast Asia
🛵 I am smaller than a car, but bigger than a scooter
🛺 I am also known as a tuk-tuk

transport.question: I travel on water, but I am not a boat. I carry cars and people across short distances. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 You can drive your car onto me
↔️ I travel between two points
🌊 I am flat and wide

transport.question: I have no engine and move using wind. I am made of fabric stretched over a frame. What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ The wind fills my 'wings'
⛵ I travel on water
🏴‍☠️ Pirates might use me

transport.question: I don't have wheels, but I can help you climb up a mountain. I carry you in the air with a cable. What am I?

hints.text: ⛰️ I am used in mountainous regions
🚠 I have cabins or chairs hanging from a cable
🎿 Skiers use me to get to the top of the slopes

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. I might even race a hare and win eventually! What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am a type of sea creature
🏡 I carry my home on my back
🥬 Sometimes people eat me with garlic butter

ocean.question: I am a large body of saltwater that covers most of the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am home to many creatures
🚢 Ships sail on me
🏖️ Beaches are on my edge

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. People say I am funny. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I have a famous animated movie about me
🤡 I am sometimes called a clown
🟠 I am orange and white

ocean.question: I am a very big sea animal. I filter tiny food from the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a type of whale
🦷 I don't have teeth
💙 I am one of the biggest animals on Earth

ocean.question: I am a place where sand meets the sea. People visit me to swim and play. What am I?

hints.text: ⛱️ You might bring a beach umbrella to me
🌊 I am at the edge of the ocean
🏰 You can build sandcastles on me

ocean.question: I am a large, flat fish that hides on the ocean floor and can change color to blend in. What am I?

hints.text: 👀 Both of my eyes are on one side of my body
🌿 I can camouflage myself
🍳 My name sounds like something you might eat for breakfast

ocean.question: I am a strong current in the ocean caused by differences in water temperature and saltiness. I can affect the climate. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I move warm water towards the poles
🧭 I am like a river in the sea
🌊 My name implies I travel around the globe

ocean.question: I am a marine mammal known for my playful behavior and high intelligence. I use echolocation to find my way. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I am often seen leaping out of the water
🗣️ I communicate using clicks and whistles
🎭 Many people think I am smiling all the time

ocean.question: I am a deep, underwater valley with steep sides, often formed by erosion or tectonic activity. What am I?

hints.text: 🌋 I can be found near mid-ocean ridges
🌍 Earthquakes can form me
⛰️ I am similar to a canyon on land, but underwater

ocean.question: I am a type of tiny marine plant that drifts in the ocean and produces much of the Earth's oxygen. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a form of algae
☀️ I use photosynthesis
🐟 Many small sea creatures eat me
